title: Day One [videogame trailer]
abstract: Will you survive your first day? (Winner in the Middle Videogame).
description: Winner in the Middle Videogame. In 2017, tens of thousands of Australians will battle the greatest mystery of their lives ... high school. In 'Day One', your mission is to survive your first day of high school. You will need to find your seat in assembly, learn a new instrument, escape detention, sprint 100 metres, destroy a vending machine, and dodge rubbish bins to ultimately find your classroom.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003253; 'Screen It' 2016 [winning entries and special mentions]; Active; 2016
